archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.3.5c: c) validating the integrity of each data source to ensure it will produce accurate and reliable KPI/KRI combinations (e.g. by using a maturity model to confirm the status of one or more environments)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
